definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 6:21 a stumbling, means or occasion of stumbling, stumbling-block;—´[[מ]] abs. Is 8:14 + 3 t., [[מִכְשׁׂל]] Le 19:14; cstr. [[מִכְשׁוֹל]] 1Sa 25:31 + 6 t. Ez; pl. [[מִכְשׁׂלִים]] Je 6:21 + Ez Eze 21:20 MT (Co al. [[מֻכְשָׁלִים]], v. infr.);—

stumbling, ´[[חוּר מ]] Is 8:14 (fig) a rock of stumbling (i.e. over which one stumbles); lit. [[הַרְבֵּה הַמִּכְשׁׂלִים]] Ez Eze 21:20 an abundance of stumblings, falls (si vera l.; LXX. oi( a)sqenou=ntev, appar. reading pt., cf. Sm; so Co Da (as a possibility), i.e. [[מֻכְשָׁלִים]]

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pt. of [[כשׁל]] = those who have stumbled or been overthrown).
means, or occasion of stumbling, stumbling-block;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig. of misfortune, calamity Ps 119:165; in divine judgment Je 6:21, Ez Eze 3:20, as a hindrance to restoration of people Is 57:14.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in ethical sense [[עֲוֹנׇם]] ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 7:19 a stumbling-block of (i.e. occasioning) their iniquity, so Eze 14:3, Eze 14:4, Eze 14:7, Eze 18:30, Eze 44:12 (mostly with ref. to idols.).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[לֵב]] ´[[מ]] 1Sa 25:31 a stumbling-block of heart i.e. ground for remorse.
